conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style 3D conversion with consistent wall heights and clear depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls, floors, and volume are perfectly rendered with consistent 3D geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout and wall placements match the 2D plan precisely. Minor merging of small utility partitions.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement captures the 2D layout accurately, including specific items like the dining set and deck chairs.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; lighting and shadows enhance readability. One minor rendering artifact on the bottom utility wall.

detected_errors.description: Minor door/threshold details in utility area are simplified compared to technical 2D sketch.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D conversion that maintains high geometric accuracy and spatial layout fidelity.
